image.title: Thanks for coming to IC Hack 19!

email.text:
**Hello Hacker!**
We hope you have fully recovered from yet again another amazing IC Hack! Thanks for coming and a massive thank you to the volunteers who made this event possible.
We hope you enjoyed IC Hack 19 as much as we did. If you have a couple minutes to spare, we would really appreciate if you could **leave feedback** on our feedback form below so we know where to improve for IC Hack 20!
Leave your feedback **[here](https://goo.gl/forms/ujON8LInBNiMsQDr1)**!
email.heading: Photos and Videos
email.text:
We've taken **plenty of photos** over the hackathon, which will be released soon (we'll send out a separate email!). Additionally, photos from the photobooth can be found [here](https://www.open.photos/ICHACK19/).
That's not it! Be sure to check out the [**montage video**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Oy6tcQY6K6Q) of the event, and if you have the time, check out the [**Opening Ceremony**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VsOa8KYeWpo) and [**Closing Ceremony**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=piaTBgY5EUc) streams.
email.heading: Lost Property
email.text: If you think you might have left something behind, be sure to let us know by emailing info@ichack.org with a description of your item!
email.heading: Coming Soon...
email.text:
With IC Hack 19 over, that means IC Hack 20 is now only a year away! If you can't wait that long, DoCSoc is currently organising **IC HealthHack 2019** with Bioengineering Society and ICSM Coding Society.
If you're passionate about solving real-life healthcare challenges, come along to IC HealthHack 2019 on **2nd - 3rd March 2019** to bring your ideas to life!
Tickets will be released soon. Stay up to date with the event over Facebook by clicking [here](https://www.facebook.com/events/293101718230640/).

We look forward to seeing you next year for **IC Hack 20**!
_- The IC Hack 19 team_
